DEFECT.DESCRIPTION:
Read overflow using expression '".xml"[5]' PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer accessed is constant string ".xml" PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer is of length 5 bytes [size of constant string] PREFAST_NEWLINE Accessing the byte at byte offset 5 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE where PREFAST_NEWLINE nullpos(".xml")`16 == 4 PREFAST_NEWLINE

Read underflow using expression '".xml"[-1]' PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer accessed is constant string ".xml" PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer is of length 5 bytes [size of constant string] PREFAST_NEWLINE Accessing the byte at byte offset -1 PREFAST_NEWLINE
